title: Ashley's Man List
description: Reeling from a recent divorce, Ashley Wilson moves from Chicago to Indianapolis to start a new life as a psychology professor at a local university. Wanting to get back into the dating game, she makes a list of different kinds of men she would like to date. Join Ashley as she navigates the sometimes scary and often funny world of on-line dating while adjusting to a new home, new job and new friends.
author: Josie Grace
